personal.name: Oliver Grudzinski
personal.title: Computer Science Student & Full Stack Developer
description: I'm a Computer Science junior at MSOE and Full Stack Development Intern at TESCH Global. I specialize in AI/ML systems, modern web applications, and data-driven solutions.

My expertise spans full-stack development, machine learning, and agile project management. As an active member of the MSOE AI Club and Society of Software Engineers, I'm always exploring cutting-edge technologies.
As an Eagle Scout, I bring discipline and leadership to every project.

expertise.title: Web Development
expertise.description: Creating responsive websites and applications using modern frameworks.

expertise.title: AI & Machine Learning
expertise.description: Building intelligent systems and practical AI solutions for real-world problems.

expertise.title: Project Management
expertise.description: Experienced in Agile and Scrum, I help teams deliver reliable software through clear communication and organized workflows.

expertise.title: Backend Development
expertise.description: Building scalable server-side applications, APIs, and database architectures for robust system performance.
